nodes.bodyText: We wanted to make it 2 sandstone here. Could make that a research though too.
think the research isnt that required though, since the sand from the crusher already hasone

I like the idea of a research for that. This already reduces the cost of sandstone quite a bit, from 4 sand to 1 sand and 1 cobble. Dropping it to 1:1 seems like a research. I'll look at that in a future round.
